description:
Renno is led between two posts without a rope barrier and falls into the river. Yatsukoshi, who had feelings for Renno`s mistress, Kakura, whose younger sister had her emotions toyed with, and Takami, whose husband cheated on her, all had motives.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le tournoi de cerfs-volants de la Tamizu (2e partie)
قضية الطائرات الورقية في نهر تيموزو (الجزء الثاني)
堤無津川凧揚げ事件 (後編)
